changesets.summary:
Default configuration improvements

- Disable debug logs by default in production
  -  https://github.com/JorgenVatle/meteor-vite/issues/275
  
- Disable stub validation warnings for packages with known undefined exports
  -  https://github.com/JorgenVatle/meteor-vite/issues/246

Normalize generated import paths to address bad import paths on Windows.

- https://github.com/JorgenVatle/meteor-vite/issues/281
Add plugin option for exposing source maps through the Meteor WebApp in production.

Place .gitignore file for temporary Vite bundle modules in temp dir root instead of the parent directory of the server entry. Addresses a concern where these temporary files might get accidentally commited into version control.
